price: Na Yeye ndiye Mwenyezi Mungu mbinguni na ardhini. Anajua ya ndani yenu na ya nje yenu. Na anajua mnayo yachuma.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: Na ni Yeye peke yake anaye stahiki kuabudiwa katika mbingu na katika ardhi. Anajua kila mnacho kificha na mnacho kionyesha. Na anajua yote mnayo yatenda, Naye atakulipeni kwa hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wafī al-arḍi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu mā taksibūna
